HomeAboutProjectsX-CorpContentBlogContact

Architecting the intersection of data, design, and narrative.

I'm Anish Dahiya, a data scientist and storyteller who builds intelligent products and communities. At X-Corp, I lead a team experimenting with applied AI—from platform strategy and model architecture to change management and creative automation.

My work spans predictive modeling, computer vision, and generative systems. I love translating complex technology into crisp strategy for leadership teams, and I document the journey for builders around the world through my creator studio.

I studied B.Tech in CSE (AIML) at Chandigarh University from 2021–2025, worked as a Subject Matter Expert (Computer Science) at Chegg, and built a bus congestion prediction model for DIMTS in 2023. Today, I'm a data scientist and creator, building X-Corp and publishing regularly across YouTube and LinkedIn.

7

Years building ML systems

Origin Story

Where it all clicked

A timeline of the decisions, experiments, and communities that shaped my craft.

  • 2025

    Scaling X-Corp

    Building an applied AI lab focused on intelligent automation, developer tooling, and creative co-pilots for enterprise teams. Now live at x-corp.in.

  • Nov 2025

    Content Creator

    Started publishing consistently across YouTube and LinkedIn—documenting AI, data science, and creator systems.

  • 2023

    Data Scientist

    Led cross-functional squads shipping personalization and risk intelligence models used by millions of customers.

  • 2023

    Bus Congestion Prediction (DIMTS)

    Built a congestion prediction model for Delhi Integrated Multi-Modal Transit System to forecast bus load and improve scheduling.

  • 2022–2024

    SME — Computer Science (Chegg)

    Solved curriculum-aligned problems and authored explanations for CS learners while pursuing undergrad.

  • 2021–2025

    B.Tech CSE (AIML), Chandigarh University

    Specialized in Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning with hands-on projects across CV, NLP, and forecasting.

  • 2018

    First ML Deployment

    Productionized a churn prediction pipeline that saved 1M USD in annualized revenue for a telecom conglomerate.
